detail_desc: Coat in a felted wool blend with notch lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and a single back vent. Unlined.
Jeggings in a soft, stretch cotton blend with a wide waistband for a more comfortable fit. Decorative fly, fake front pockets , real back pockets and slim legs.

Blouse in an airy weave with a stand-up collar and gathers at the top both front and back to create soft draping. Opening at the back with buttons at the back of the neck, long balloon sleeves with close-fitting, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in stretch denim with a zip fly and super-skinny legs.
Short, pattern-weave shorts with elastication at the back of the waist and a tie belt. Lace-trimmed side pockets and a small frill trim at the hems. Unlined.
Y-shaped necklace in gold-plated metal with a heavier pendant at the bottom. Length 67 cm.
Cap in cotton twill with an adjustable metal fastening at the back.
Jumper in soft, jacquard-knit cotton with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Fully lined bikini top in scuba fabric with wide shoulder straps and no fasteners.
Short-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round neckline.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Pockets in the side seams, a back pocket and ribbed hems.
Transparent silicone smartphone case with an adjustable fabric neck cord.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a waistband.
Fitted vest top in ribbed cotton jersey. Deep V-neck front and back with a small lace trim, and a small lace trim around the armholes.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 1.8 cm.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with elasticated ribbing at the waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.

Batik-patterned bikini. Lined top with adjustable, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps, decorative gathers at the front and a plastic fastener at the back. Fully lined bikini bottoms. The polyester content of the bikini’s outer fabric and lining is recycled.
Cold shoulder blouse in woven fabric with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, elastication and a flounce at the top, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a smocked hem.
Flock-print tights with an elasticated waist.
Shorts in an airy, patterned cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly.

Set with a pair of joggers and a hoodie in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and a matching T-shirt in organic cotton jersey. Joggers with an elasticated, drawstring waist, discreet side pockets and ribbed hems. Hoodie with a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. T-shirt with a narrow, ribbed trim around the neckline.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details and short raglan sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.
Sleeveless dress in soft, printed cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Dressing gown in soft, patterned fleece with a hood, side pockets and tie belt at the waist.

Jumper in a soft fine knit with a unique nursing feature, round neck, long sleeves and ties at the sides. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Trainers in fabric with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and a small loop at the back. Patterned soles with a good grip.
Knee-length satin skirt with a high, elasticated waist and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Sweatshirt in a printed cotton blend with a round neckline, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a bodysuit and trousers in jersey made from an organic cotton blend. Bodysuit with a sewn-on bow tie and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Sewn-on waistcoat with a decorative chest pocket, buttons down the front and press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. Trousers with foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.

Shirt in an organic cotton weave with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long, cuffed sleeves, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a detachable tie belt below the bust, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and short slits in the sides. Unlined.
Joggers in cotton twill with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist. Side pockets, a fake fly and tapered legs with decorative seams and ribbed hems.
Pre-tied bow tie with an elastic strap and adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Width 10 cm.

Shirt in checked cotton twill with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Double-layered, rectangular scarf in satin made from recycled polyester.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a round neckline that has an opening and a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with a drawstring and a flounce at the cuffs. Unlined.
Three-strand metal necklace with one round pendant and one bar-shaped pendant with a stone-like plastic bead. Adjustable length 38-47 cm.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in stretch cotton jersey with a collar and button placket. Slim fit.
V-neck top in soft slub jersey with short sleeves, a seam centre back and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 50x180 cm.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets, a back pocket and a fake fly. Tapered legs with decorative stitching at the knees and covered elastication at the hems.
Knee-length skirt with a concealed zip at the back.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Metal hoop earrings. Diameter 4.5 cm.
Short suede skirt with decorative seams. Visible zip at the back. Lined.
Pyjamas in jersey made from a viscose and cotton blend with lace details. V-neck top with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and short shorts with an elasticated waist.
Metal hoop earrings. Three different sizes: 2 cm, 4 cm and 6 cm.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a large chest pocket, 3/4-length, double-layered sleeves and raw edges.

Padded ski jacket in windproof, water-repellent breathable functional fabric with closed seams at critical points, a lined hood with a peak and elastic drawstring, and a zip down the front. Side pockets, a chest pocket, zipped lift pass pocket and two inner pockets, one with a zip and the other in mesh. Snow flap with reinforced elastication and press-studs at the waist, an adjustable hook and loop tab at the cuffs, and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Vest tops in soft organic cotton slub jersey with gathered frills around the armholes.
Slightly shorter, straight-cut top in a crinkled weave with a V-neck, lace at the top and adjustable spaghetti straps.

Padded, quilted parka in woven fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front and zipped side pockets. Tie belt at the waist, inner ribbing at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Lined. Polyester filling.
Derby shoes with open lacing at the front. Canvas linings and insoles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Sleeveless playsuit in a soft viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.

Lightly padded, fitted jacket in fast-drying functional fabric containing some scuba. High stand-up collar with an integral hood, a zip down the front and concealed zipped side pockets. Extended inner ribbing with thumbholes, and reflective details. Slightly longer at the back. Partially lined.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs at the side and crotch.

Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with reversible sequins on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins). Slightly wider neckline with a narrow, ribbed trim, and a lace trim at the hem. Rounded and longer at the back.
Short shorts in soft jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Knitted hat with earflaps and ties under the chin. Jersey lining.
Hipster briefs in microfibre and hole-patterned lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back. The briefs are made partly from recycled polyamide.

Short dress in a crinkled weave with embroidery at the top. Square, elasticated, frill-trimmed neckline and short puff sleeves with smocking and a frill trim. Elasticated seam at the waist and a gathered seam on the skirt for added width and soft draping. The skirt has a jersey lining.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a ribbed neckline and tie detail at the front of the hem.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit containing glittery threads with a reversible sequin motif on the front (sizes 1½-4Y with normal sequins).
Pyjama top and shorts in soft cotton. Jersey top with an all-over print and short, frill-trimmed sleeves. Short shorts in soft, patterned twill with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and rounded hem.
Fitted, V-neck top in a rib-knit viscose blend with a collar and short, frill-trimmed sleeves.
Straight-cut shirt in imitation leather with a collar, press-studs down the front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves, cuffs with press-studs, and a rounded hem.
Short, boxy-style top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs. Smocking at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in crinkled jersey with elasticated smocking and a small frill trim at the waist and a decorative bow at the front.
Belt in regenerated leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 3.5 cm.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
